Package de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.client

NA(A/R) API facade.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientFacade
    Facade for an NA(A/R) to submit new connections and connection changes to a TNC(S/C).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultClientFacade
    Default client facade to interact with a TNC(C/S).
    GlobalHandshakeRetryProxy
    Helper to manage global handshake request retries like events.
